alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Hardin; Logan; Miami; Shelby; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 4:32AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN SHELBY, CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN, NORTHERN CLARK AND HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, UNION COUNTY IN CENTRAL OHIO AND MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 530 AM EST... At 432 AM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Arlington to near Arcanum, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Troy, Marysville, Sidney, Piqua, Bellefontaine, Urbana, Tipp City, Kenton, Ada, Covington, Richwood, St. Paris, West Liberty, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, Jackson Center, Forest, Russells Point and De Graff. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 63 and 70. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 71 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM EST for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Hardin; Logan; Miami; Shelby; Union
